41RCHAR_T ALNUM[] = {'a','l','n','u','m',0};
42RCHAR_T ALPHA[] = {'a','l','p','h','a',0};
43RCHAR_T BLANK[] = {'b','l','a','n','k',0};
44RCHAR_T CNTRL[] = {'c','n','t','r','l',0};
45RCHAR_T DIGIT[] = {'d','i','g','i','t',0};
46RCHAR_T GRAPH[] = {'g','r','a','p','h',0};
47RCHAR_T LOWER[] = {'l','o','w','e','r',0};
48RCHAR_T PRINT[] = {'p','r','i','n','t',0};
49RCHAR_T PUNCT[] = {'p','u','n','c','t',0};
50RCHAR_T SPACE[] = {'s','p','a','c','e',0};
51RCHAR_T UPPER[] = {'u','p','p','e','r',0};
52RCHAR_T XDIGIT[] = {'x','d','i','g','i','t',0};
53
54/* character-class table */
55static struct cclass {
56 RCHAR_T *name;
57 const char *chars;
58 const char *multis;
59} cclasses[] = {
60 { ALNUM, "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz\
610123456789", "" },
62 { ALPHA, "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz",
63 "" },
64 { BLANK, " \t", "" },
65 { CNTRL, "\007\b\t\n\v\f\r\1\2\3\4\5\6\16\17\20\21\22\23\24\
66\25\26\27\30\31\32\33\34\35\36\37\177", "" },
67 { DIGIT, "0123456789", "" },
68 { GRAPH, "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz\
690123456789!\"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\\]^_`{|}~",
70 "" },
71 { LOWER, "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz",
72 "" },
73 { PRINT, "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz\
740123456789!\"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\\]^_`{|}~ ",
75 "" },
76 { PUNCT, "!\"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\\]^_`{|}~",
77 "" },
78 { SPACE, "\t\n\v\f\r ", "" },
79 { UPPER, "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ",
80 "" },
81 { XDIGIT, "0123456789ABCDEFabcdef",
82 "" },
83 { NULL, 0, "" },
84};
